elsa.util

Class TermsIdFreq

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable
        • elsa.util.TermsIdFreq
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map

    public class TermsIdFreq
extends java.util.Hashtable
    La classe TermsIdFreq e' usata per associare gli id dei termini alle frequenze di occorrenza.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
